property starting_workflows
class catplat.workflows.manager.Project(name, jobrunner, calculation_path, database_path, output_writer=None, num_job_run_slots=1, auto_create_folders=True, ml_preoptimization=False, test=False, ml_potential_hash=None, skip_materials_project=False)[source]

Bases: object

This is a boundary class in which the users interact with. This class contains user settings as mentioned in the attributes below.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Name of the pyatoms settings folder in .pyatoms/vasp.

  • calculation_path (str) – Directory of project folder.

  • jobrunner (OverallJobRunner, FakeVaspOverallJobRunner) – Jobrunner class that contains server information and how to run VASP.

  • num_job_run_slots (int) – Number of jobs to run in parallel.

  • auto_create_folders (bool) – Flag to automatically create calculation and database folders.

  • ml_preoptimization (bool) – Flag to use machine learning preoptimization. Default is False.

database(path=None)[source]

class catplat.workflows.manager.Results(entries)[source]

Bases: object

This is a class instatiated by the Project class using Project.retreive(QuerySet). This class contains the entries and helps to easily access the database to get the DatabaseAttibutes.

catplat.workflows.workflow module

This module consists of the abstract base class templates in which the bulk, slab and adsorbate workflows inherit from.

class catplat.workflows.workflow.Workflow(atoms, blueprint, db_id, parent, project_settings, output_writer=None, parallel=True, query_only=False, disable_ml_preoptimization=False, disable_optimization=False)[source]

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for all workflows.

Parameters:

  • disable_ml_preoptimization (bool) – If True, disables ML preoptimization. For debugging purposes only.

  • disable_optimization (bool) – If True, disables optimization. For debugging purposes only.
